name: Redistricting
description:
Stay in power as long as you can as support for your party wanes by gerrymandering!

Use the buttons on the left to select which district to paint. Left-click to paint the selected district, right-click to erase. To proceed to the next level, each space on the map must be assigned to a district, and your party must win a majority of the districts.

This is my first ever Bevy game, and my first ever game jam game. I would have liked to have had more time to spend on it to make it not so ugly, but alas.

Source code: https://github.com/rotoclone/bevy-jam-01
